Projects About

Fisher & Paykel Healthcare

Company/Domain: Embedded healthcare devices

Role: Full time embedded systems engineer, directly involved with several products groups and cross-functional teams

Problem

Providing and continuing to improve patient care and outcomes through respiratory humidification.

Objectives & Constraints

  • Software updates and algorithms improving current and legacy devices
  • Understand customer needs to provide continuous improvement of products
  • Data and pattern analysis to ensure the correct problems are being solved

Solution Overview

Yearly software releases, algorithm improvements, business and requirements analysis. Reach out directly for more information.

Implementation Highlights

  • C++
  • Python scripting
  • Testing/validation design
  • Strict documentation processes
  • External communications
  • Business planning, scoping, project management
